readme: # Mecedor Syntax Mecedor - the syntax theme, you'll love! An Atom syntax theme based on top cobalt. A refined colour scheme that is easy on the eyes. Pairs well with built-in One Dark UI Theme. ## Installation APM: `apm install mecedor-syntax` Preferences: 1. Go to `Preferences > Install` and choose `Themes` 2. Search for `mecedor-syntax` and install it 3. Go to `Preferences > Themes` and choose Cobalt2 as the syntax theme ## Theme
